1. Create a image of your GT4 DVD using DVDdecrypter

2. Start apache.exe - open the image you just created (file --> open )- Right click on the IMG file in the left window and extract all. ! Save on c: ! *

3. Start apache.exe - open the same file as above - Right click on the IMG file in the left window and change layer. Extract the singel file on the other layer to the same directory as above.

4. Unpack this zip and overwrite all files in (c:GRANTURISMO4)* move gt4_hdd.iml and gt4_hdd.ims to c:
	 If you have used any other directory or HDD you have to change the path in the file gt4_hdd.iml using a text editor
	 so it points to the right path and file. RECOMENDED USING THE DIRECTORY STRUCTURE SUGGESTED

5. Now use gdvd4-iml2iso.exe to create a new ISO. Click the dots (....) open the gt4_hdd.iml then click start. Wait and then you will have a 5,25Gb file.

6. Copy the new file gt4_hdd.iso to your ps2 

7. Have fun.
